properties.name: qishon.rest.docs.service.apis
properties.description: must required! one package of controller shown in swagger. like 'com.qishon.xxx.controller'.

properties.name: qishon.rest.docs.service.contact.name
properties.description: the service creator or maintainer's name.
properties.defaultValue: 服务创建者或维护者姓名

properties.name: qishon.rest.docs.service.contact.url
properties.description: the service creator or maintainer's self-url, or the url address of the service.
properties.defaultValue: 服务创建者或维护者博客或github地址，也可以当成服务地址

properties.name: qishon.rest.docs.service.contact.email
properties.description: the service creator or maintainer's email.
properties.defaultValue: 服务创建者或维护者邮箱
